availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Anderson (Accused of murdering Isham Curtis Moody )

body.p: Shelby County, Kentucky, resident and soldier. Shelby County, Kentucky, resident in 1862. Accused of murdering Isham Curtis Moody in Shelby County in 1861. Served in the 3rd Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry (C.S.A.) as a private from September 10, 1862.

ab.bibl:
"Caught" Courier-Journal (Louisville, KY),, August 14, 1862, p. 1.
"The Shelby News", Courier-Journal (Louisville, KY), October 17, 1862, p. 1.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky: Confederate Kentucky Volunteers War 1861-65, vol. 1 (Frankfort: Legislature of Kentucky, 1915), p. 616.
KYR-0001-029-0060.
